Question: This person starred in the NBC sitcom Community, as aging moist-towelette tycoon Pierce Hawthorne, whom he has played since 2009.
Hints: In a 2007 biography, this person claims that he was abused as a child by his mother and stepfather, John Cederquist.
This person is descended from upstate New York Kanienkehaka, the Native Americans known as the Mohawks.
This person appeared in a prominent recurring role as villainous software magnate Ted Roark on the NBC spy-comedy Chuck.
